Description:
The Microsoft AI Cloud Partner Program is the primary way we engage and invest in our partner ecosystem. The program brings everything together across the whole of the partner lifecycle, including onboarding, skilling, go-to-market, incentives, and co-selling. In this session, learn about our Partner Program, its evolution, exciting new offers and how it enables partners drive growth.

Delivered in a silent stage breakout.

To learn more, please check out these resources: \* https://aka.ms/partnerprogrambenefits \* https://aka.ms/DistributorPartnerDesignation \* https://aka.ms/DigitalSovereigntySpecialization \* https://aka.ms/ClinicalAppsSpec \* https://aka.ms/SupportServicesDesignation ğ—¦ğ—½ğ—²ğ—®ğ—¸ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜€: \* Sam King \* Regina Manfredi \* Julie Sanford \* Steve Thomas ğ—¦ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—œğ—»ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»: This is one of many sessions from the Microsoft Ignite 2025 event. Chapters: 0:00 - Introduction to the Microsoft AI Cloud Partner Ecosystem and Investments 00:07:02 - Copilot Program Expansion, Partner Learnings, and SMB Offerings 00:09:08 - Closing Remarks from Julie Sanford and Transition to Steve Thomas 00:11:30 - New Benefits Added: Copilot Studio, 365 Copilot, and Dragon Copilot 00:21:46 - Introduction of Copilot Specialization and partner momentum 00:25:22 - Session closing and transition to partner discussion 00:31:56 - Scaling as a New Currency for ROI and Growth 00:32:45 - Leveraging Data to Unblock Stalled Revenue and Drive Growth 00:35:38 - Data Strategy as the Foundation for AI Success

Title: Grow your business with Microsoft AI Cloud Partner Program | PBRK415
